# Streamer Bot Subathon Timer Import Code

``

# Steps after import

1. In OBS: Create scene `[NS] SubathonTimer` with a text source `[TS] SubathonCounter`. Add this nested scene into any other scenes you need.

2. Streamer Bot > Actions > `SubathonStart` > Double-click `Execute Code (startSubathonTimer)` > add `System.dll` as a reference

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8848167/170418099-6dd9225d-51b7-4eed-978a-4218e3814179.png)

3. Point the Tier 1, Tier 2, and Tier 3 sub, re-sub, gift sub events to their respective actions.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8848167/170416446-2b4716b7-001d-4c2e-8a49-2fb2693f4efc.png)

4. Streamer Bot > Commands > Add a command and point it to `SubathonStart`. This will start the Subathon Timer.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8848167/170418297-e4d158a0-5785-4d20-b8e7-d09eea4b255c.png)

5. Streamer Bot > Commands > Add a command and point it to `SubathonStop`. This will cancel the timer.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8848167/170418584-0ac704f0-e5d3-4120-ac0c-7ea5d064aebe.png)

6.  Action `SubathonDone` will be triggered once the timer runs out.
